title: [Large-Scale] Library Educational Material Design Strategies Considering Global Inclusivity

context.prior_knowledge: Basic information literacy understanding, no experience in educational material development
context.additional_context: For administrators utilizing educational materials in multicultural settings. Requires content optimized for smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more evaluation criteria for educational materials based on global DEI principles (Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion).
Learners can design a two-stage or more library material selection process reflecting cultural contexts.
Learners can create inclusive educational material guidelines applicable in smartphone environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
